mapper.select: select annNo, annTitle, annContent, annPopup, annDate from ( select /*+ INDEX_DESC(tbl_announcements pk_announcements) */ rownum rn, annNo, annTitle, annContent, annPopup, annDate from tbl_announcements where ( annTitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or annContent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' ) and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1) * #{amount}
select count(*) from tbl_announcements where ( annTitle like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or annContent like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' )
mapper.insert: insert into tbl_announcements (annNo, annTitle, annContent, annPopup) values (seq_ann.nextval, #{annTitle}, #{annContent}, #{annPopup})
mapper.update: update tbl_announcements set annTitle = #{annTitle}, annContent = #{annContent}, annPopup = #{annPopup}, annDate = sysdate where annNo = #{annNo}
